name: Barro 2021
description:
Barro 2021 is the next gen for the Barro series, new mechanics, new race tracks, more fun.


The game:

  • Casual race, just have fun.
  • Time trial, do your best and compete with players all around the word.
  • Local multiplayer, split screen, challenge your friends!
  • New race tracks.
  • New cars.
